db:info.db:title: Qt Spatial Audio Module C++ Classes

db:abstract.db:para: The Qt Spatial Audio module provides functionality for 3D audio.

db:article.db:para: The Qt Spatial Audio module provides functionality for 3D audio.

db:listitem.db:para: QAudioEngine manages a three dimensional sound field.
Defines the position and orientation of the person listening to a sound field defined by QAudioEngine.

db:section.db:title: Using the Module
db:section.db:para: Using a Qt module requires linking against the module library, either directly or through other dependencies. Several build tools have dedicated support for this, including CMake and qmake.

db:section.db:title: Building with CMake
db:section.db:para: Use the find_package() command to locate the needed module components in the Qt6 package:
db:section.db:programlisting: find_package(Qt6 REQUIRED COMPONENTS SpatialAudio) target_link_libraries(my_project PRIVATE Qt6::SpatialAudio)
